data.title: Breast Surgery, Breast Surgical Oncology, General Surgery
data.meta_description: Find information about and book an appointment with Dr. Dawn J. Leonard, MD in Newark, DE. Specialties: Breast Surgery, Breast Surgical Oncology, General Surgery.
data.text:
Dawn Leonard, MD, FACS, specializes in breast surgery at ChristianaCare. Dr. Leonard joined ChristianaCare with more than 17 years of practice and leadership experience, most recently at Georgetown University Hospital and as the site director at a community hospital with a Regional Breast Health Program. She previously served as a medical director of a breast center and division chief of breast surgery with hospital-based breast care services, and founded a solo practice specializing in care and surgery for patients with breast cancer and benign diseases of the breast.

Dr. Leonard earned her medical degree at Howard University College of Medicine. She completed a surgical residency at Howard University and a breast surgical oncology fellowship at Washington Hospital Center in Washington, D.C with additional training in plastic surgery at State University of New York, Downstate. Dr. Leonard is board-certified in general surgery by the American Board of Surgery.

Dr. Leonard has earned multiple recognitions as a “Top Doc” in Breast Surgery and awards for excellence in healthcare, service and scholarship. She is a fellow of the American College of Surgeons and a member of the American Society of Breast Surgeons, American Society of Breast Disease, Association of Women Surgeons, and LaSalle D. Leffrall Jr., M.D. Surgical Society.
